description:
From our Binghamton, New York, location, our team at The Stanley Law Offices, L.L.P., works diligently to protect the rights of people like you who have suffered a personal injury. We have 90 years of combined experience fighting for the compensation necessary to help you move forward with your life. As a client-centered firm, we offer personalized representation, from your free initial consultation to the final decision and beyond.

The attorneys at our law offices are well-versed in personal injury claims, including motor vehicle accidents, premises liability, medical malpractice and construction accidents. If you have experienced an on-the-job injury, you can turn to our team for the sound legal advice that can help you navigate the claims process. No matter what your situation, you can expect compassionate attention from a team that has your best interests in mind.

Throughout every phase of your case, one of the attorneys at The Stanley Law Offices, L.L.P., will keep you apprised of how matters are progressing. We will be honest with you regarding your options and work with you to develop a comprehensive legal strategy. In addition to representing clients in Binghamton, we work with people across the state of New York, including those in Watertown, Rochester, Syracuse and Central New York. We also handle cases in Montrose and Northeast Pennsylvania.
